thread.title: Trump calls for bipartisan immigration reform

title: Trump calls for bipartisan immigration reform
text:
Trump calls for bipartisan immigration reform Tuesday, January 30, 2018 - 02:10 
In his first State of the Union address, U.S. President Donald Trump called on Republicans and Democrats to support his immigration reform proposal, which he called a “fair compromise.'' (no reporter narration)   
In his first State of the Union address, U.S. President Donald Trump called on Republicans and Democrats to support his immigration reform proposal, which he called a “fair compromise." (no reporter narration)  //reut.rs/2DQcreG
